biotools.summary: SMART-HF is an online AI app for risk stratification of heart failure patients, based on the Japanese heart failure registry (JROADHF) of ten thousands of people. SMART-HF predicts the prognosis of one-year survival ratio after hospitalization due to acute decompensated heart failure. This app is designed for not only healthcare providers but also non-healthcare providers.
